name: Mr. Nutkins
description:
Mr. Nutkins is tired of litterbugs.  Help him clean up the mess.

Mr. Nutkins is trying to get on Xbox, Steam, and Android.  These platforms are expensive, and are around $100 to submit.  The standard Windows executable version is free.  Other platform versions require money.  Could you help Mr. Nutkins get on Xbox, Steam, and Android?
